alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 19 at 8:41PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory in effect through Thursday... * Active thunderstorms associated with a tropical low just south of American Samoa will bring strong and gusty Northwest winds across the islands. Expect higher and gusty winds downslope mountains. * TIMING...Until Thursday * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking dangerous. Downed shallow-root trees and phone lines are possible. Shifting of loose and unsecured objects are also possible. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 830 PO ASO LULU IANUARI 19 2022 ...UA NEI SE FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O loo gasolo mai i luga o le atunu`u faititili ma timuga mamafa o loo lata i se taavili o savili i saute o le atusamoa. O nei faititili e ono mafua ai ona agi malosi ma faata`uta`u savili. * TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi. * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u laau, lelea ai mea-totino e le`i faamaumauina. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe ai taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo savili malolosi o lona uiga o savili e oo atu i le 35 mph ma e agi faata`uta`u o le a aafia ai le atunuu. O nei savili malolosi o le a faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise lava taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Faamolemole ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of up to 35 mph with higher gusts are expected. Winds This strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
